article_title: Hedge-Fund Manager David Tepper Concerned About Market
article_text:
LAS VEGAS—A series of bullish bets helped David Tepper build a $20 billion hedge-fund firm. But on Wednesday he struck a cautious note, worried about slow U.S. growth and the risk of a global economy that will worsen unless the European Central Bank takes aggressive action.

Speaking at the annual SALT conference at the Bellagio resort in Las...
